Name: Princess Castle Quest
About the game: Princess Castle Quest is an experience that blends adventure and discovery with a large variety of challenging puzzle mechanics. Over of the course of 7 different packs you will explore ancient pyramids, dangerous lava caves, and even travel to outer space as you try to save up diamonds to buy your own castle. With the largest variety of puzzle mechanics ever seen together, you will constantly be encountering new and unique mechanics while also seeing new takes on classic mechanics like portals and lasers. The game includes a large variety of difficulty ranges, from easy enjoyable puzzles, to head scratching conundrums. It also supports local coop, or remote play together through Steam, which can be toggled on at any time during the main adventure levels. Once you've mastered the mechanics from there, take your skills to the next level using the built in Level Editor which allows you to create your own adventure. Or download and play one of the hundreds of puzzles created by the community members. There is no limit to the possibilities in this puzzle/adventure engine.
